title: section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Insurance
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Insurance 

and Reinsurance) (Amendment) Regulations 2020. 

(2) These Regulations come into operation on 30 June 2020.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited european union (insurance reinsurance) (amendment) regulation 2020 (2) regulation come operation 30 june 2020

title: section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the
heading: 2. The European Union (Insurance and Reinsurance) Regulations 2015
text_raw:
2. The European Union (Insurance and Reinsurance) Regulations 2015 

(S.I. No. 485 of 2015) are amended - 

(a) 

in Regulation 3, by the substitution of the following definition 
for the definition of “the Directive”: 

“ ‘the Directive’ means Directive 2009/138/EC of the European 
Parliament and of the Council of 25 November 20091 on the 
taking up and pursuit of the business of Insurance and 
Reinsurance (Solvency II) as amended by Directive 2011/89/EU 
of the European Parliament and of the Council of 16 November 
20113, Directive 2012/23/EU of the European Parliament and of 
the Council of 12 September 20124, Council Directive 
2013/23/EU of 13 May 20135, Directive 2013/58/EU of the 
European Parliament and of the Council of 11 December 20136, 
Directive 2014/51/EU of the European Parliament and of the 
Council of 16 April 20147, Directive 2016/2341/EU of the 
European Parliament and of the Council of 14 December 20168, 
Regulation (EU) 2017/2402 of the European Parliament and of 
the Council of 12 December 20179, Directive 2018/843/EU of 

1 OJ No. L 335, 17.12.2009, p. 1 
2 OJ No. L 334, 27.12.2019, p. 155 
3 OJ No. L 326, 8.12.2011, p. 113 
4 OJ No. L 249, 14.9.2012, p. 1 
5 OJ No. L 158, 10.6.2013, p. 362 
6 OJ No. L 341, 18.12.2013, p. 1 
7 OJ No. L 153, 22.5.2014, p. 1 
8 OJ No. L 354, 23.12.2016, p. 37 
9 OJ No. L 347, 28.12.2017, p. 35 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 8th May, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [158] 3 

the European Parliament and of the Council of 30 May 201810 
and Directive (EU) 2019/2177 of the European Parliament and 
of the Council of 18 December 20192;”, 

and 

(b) 

in Regulation 88(8), by the substitution of “85 basis points” for 
“100 basis points”. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for Finance, 

1 May, 2020. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance. 

10 OJ No. L 156, 19.6.2018, p. 43
